All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AmbientLight
Class representing ambient light in a 3D environment The ambient light is a constant light that illuminates all objects equally
Camera
The Camera class represents a virtual camera in 3D space.
Camera.Builder
Builder class for constructing a Camera instance.
Color
Wrapper class for java.jwt.Color The constructors operate with any non-negative RGB values.
Cylinder
The Cylinder class extends the Tube class and represents a cylinder in 3D space.
Double3
This class will serve all primitive classes based on three numbers
Geometries
The Geometries class is a Composite class that represents a collection of geometries.
Geometry
The Geometry class is the base
Intersectable
The Intersectable interface defines the method for finding intersections between a ray and geometries.
Main
Test program for the 1st stage
Plane
The Plane class extends the Geometry class
Point
This class make point in 3D space xyz coordinates of a point
Polygon
Polygon class represents two-dimensional polygon in 3D Cartesian coordinate system
RadialGeometry
The RadialGeometry class extends the Geometry class and represents a radial geometry object in the 3D space with a radius value
Ray
This class make ray in 3D space head point and direction vector
RayTracerBase
Abstract class for ray tracing in a scene This class serves as a base for different ray tracing algorithms
RayTracerType
Ray tracer types
RenderTests
Test rendering a basic image
Scene
Class representing a scene in a 3D environment The scene contains a name, background color, ambient light, and geometries
SimpleRayTracer
 
Sphere
The Sphere class extends the RadialGeometry class
Triangle
Triangle class represents a triangle in 3D Cartesian coordinate
Tube
Tube class represents a tube in 3D Cartesian coordinate extends RadialGeometry axis - the axis of the tube radius - the radius of the tube
Util
Util class is used for some internal utilities, e.g.
Vector
The Vector class extends the Point class to represent a vector in 3D space.
